title: Mature Content
description:
As Hollywood’s perennial bachelor, I have a reputation to protect. Everything changes the moment Ivy Parrish arrives on set. Fresh-faced and doe-eyed, her innocence calls to me like a moth to a flame. I know I should stay away before she becomes tabloid fodder. But I don’t plan on it when she calls me Daddy. 
Dear Reader: Ford Harmon is the leading man of your dreams. This silver screen sex god is ready to run lines. We’ve got our script memorized. Do you? Love, AJ + Rebecca
author: A.J. Alexander
